abstract: Cisco Systems, Intel and four other backers of the wireless Internet standard WiMax said they want to help spread use of the technology by limiting possible patent royalties.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems, Intel and four other backers of the wireless Internet standard WiMax said they want to help spread use of the technology by limiting possible patent royalties.

headline.main: WiMax Backers Seek to Encourage Use by Pooling Patents
